author: n-tv.de
title: Ground News - “Change the course of war”: London promises Ukraine 10,000 drones
text: Since the start of the war, Great Britain has stood closely with Ukraine. Time and again, London also supports the country attacked by Russia with arms supplies. The British Secretary of Defense is now announcing the “largest military support package to date.” Summary by N-tv.de 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] n-tv.de “Change the course of war”: London promises Ukraine 10,000 drones Since the start of the war, Great Britain has stood closely with Ukraine. Time and again, London also supports the country attacked by Russia with arms supplies.
